sourcesContent:
import "../styles/User.css"; export function User({ name, books }) { const latestBooks = books .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.createdAt) - new Date(a.createdAt)) .slice(-3); return (
{}

{name}

{books.length} books

Recent Books

    {latestBooks.map((book) => (
  • {book.title}

    Author: {book.author}

    Published Year: {book.publishedYear}

    Genre: {book.genre}

    Read Status: {book.read}

    Created At: {new Date(book.createdAt).toLocaleString()}

    • ))}
); }
